name: Untie the Happiness
description:
Tap the happiness of the Chinese characters, carry it to the left of the area.

If you were other Chinese characters, carry it to the right of the area.

There are 10 seconds of the time limit for each round.

When you proceed round, happiness of the Chinese characters might would have been hidden in the other characters.

Please try to lightly shake the device at that time. (Please be careful not to drop.)

It might be the character will appear.

If success in one bonus point is added.
